name: Televisio
description:
Greetings!

Televisio is a storytelling game where we play our conversation with a man trapped inside the television

Does It Have a Story?

Interactively tells us how to anger an angry and grumpy man who is stuck inside the television by turning on the television, the man asking us to turn off the television, and the resulting argument. You can reach different ends of the game by making different button combinations

This game was made in 48 hours with Inside the Box theme for Untitled Beikoz Jam hosted by Beikoz

Controls

Click: LMB
* You will need to use Left and Right Arrow Keys

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to narrative games
• People in the Beikoz Game Development Community
• Angry man stuck inside the tv
• My little brother who likes to press the buttons of the TV
• Our friends who are curious about the game we made

System Requirements

You can even play on a Soap
